mapper.sql: select c.id, c.cabinet_no, c.name, c.cabinet_type_id, c.total_slots, c.free_slots, c.used_slots, c.available_num, c.description, c.location_id, c.status, c.del_flag, c.create_by, c.create_time, c.update_by, c.update_time, c.remark, ct.name as cabinet_type_name from cabinet c left join cabinet_type ct on c.cabinet_type_id = ct.id
